description:
Packable, comfortable, and recycled, these pants a great for weekend getaways. Feeling as good as sweats, but with a lot more style, the inMotion Lightweight pants can take you from the office to the patio.

  • Repreve® recycled polyester blend wears well, has plenty of stretch and dries quickly
  • Elasticised rear waistband gives a clean look and a comfy fit
  • Dual hand pockets and single side zippered pocket gives you lots of room for must haves
  • tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold
  • Regular fit, mid-rise wears just like you hoped they would
name: tentree inMotion Lightweight Pant - Women's
